nodes.excerpt: Soundescape is a free web application for ambient background sounds. If you struggle to concentrate while working from home, this tool is for you! Audio is rendered in 3D, and you'll never hear the exact same combination of audio twice, as everything is generated randomly.
nodes.title: Soundescape - Generative 3D audio environments for focused work
nodes.author: Maximilian Torggler

nodes.excerpt: The YouTuber ATM machine. Creator Cash allows you to access YouTube earnings immediately. No more waiting an entire month to get paid. Uploaded a video today? Get paid today! Coupled with earnings analytics, Creator Cash is the financial hub for YouTubers.
nodes.title: Creator Cash - The app for creators to get paid without waiting
